name: databricks-governance
description: Comprehensive data governance toolkit for Databricks Unity Catalog. Includes 10 commands for compliance and security, 8 specialized agents for governance, 4 skills for regulatory patterns, and 2 MCP servers for governance automation. Implement GDPR, HIPAA, SOC2 compliance with automated auditing, data classification, PII detection, access control, and lineage tracking.
